short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No Game No Life Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD No Game No Life background. No Game No Life theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate through No Game No Life wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Choose a random No Game No Life background or select your favorite in the wallpaper panel.
3. Google-powered search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Quick links to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for easy website access.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes easily.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Instant wallpaper downloads.
14. Fast access to gaming.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your No Game No Life new tab.
